text.name: sys_description
text.text: TeknoParrot is a compatibility layer allowing Windows PCs to run games originally designed for Windows-based and some Linux-based arcade systems. It includes the ability to map standard PC gear like steering wheels and gamepads to the games. TeknoParrot currently supports over 170 arcade titles in 2022! New games are regularly added and existing game issues are regularly fixed. These are all the latest 3D systems from Gaelco, Konami, Namco, SEGA, Taito and Global VR.
